daily_fact: Mamdani's willingness to engage with JPMorgan's Dimon, despite past criticisms, showcases a commitment to open dialogue and collaboration in New York's dynamic business landscape.
topline_md: Multiple subway lines have resumed service following an incident where a person was struck by a train, while significant snowfall is expected across parts of New York, and Rep. Elise Stefanik is set to announce her bid for governor.

risks_alerts.title: Risks & Alerts
risks_alerts.summary_md:

- Multiple subway lines have resumed service after a person was struck by a train. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- Significant snow is forecast for parts of New York, with cold temperatures expected in NYC. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
